name: FoonaLink
description:
FOONALINK

Foonalink is a game made for the GMTK2021

Theme was "Joined Together"

I made it alone in 24h of work approximately, because I start Saturday instead of Friday and because sleeping is good for health !

I hope you will enjoy.

Inputs : Mouse aiming, Left click to Link, Right click to dash, R to restart

Software : Construct 2, Asperite, Bfxr, Audacity

Also, here is a credit for 3 things I used:

Music :

- Dire Space Emergency | Royalty Free Dark Chiptune Music 

by Silverman Sound Studios

- Dub Hub ♫ NO COPYRIGHT 8-bit Music

by Jimmy Fontanez 

- Pixel Button Prompts!

by Retrocademedia

Thanks you guys for your contents
